beginner.label: Beginner
beginner.desc: New to fitness or getting back after a long break

activity.title: What's your activity level?
activity.desc: This helps us calculate your daily energy needs

veryActive.label: Very Active
veryActive.desc: Daily exercise or physically demanding job

goal.title: What is your goal?
goal.desc: This helps us generate a plan for your calorie intake.

loseWeight.label: Lose weight
loseWeight.desc: Focus on reducing overall body weight

loseFat.label: Lose fat and maintain muscle
loseFat.desc: Focus on fat loss while preserving muscle mass

recomposition.label: Lose fat and gain muscle
recomposition.desc: Body recomposition - simultaneously reduce fat and build muscle

maintainHealth.label: Maintain and improve health
maintainHealth.desc: Focus on overall health and wellness while maintaining weight

maintainAthletic.label: Maintain athletic performance
maintainAthletic.desc: Maintain weight while optimizing for athletic performance

gainMuscle.label: Gain muscle
gainMuscle.desc: Focus on building muscle mass with minimal fat gain

gainWeight.label: Gain weight
gainWeight.desc: Focus on increasing overall body weight

workoutDays.title: How many workouts do you do per week?

workoutDuration.title: How long do you prefer to workout?

obstacles.title: What obstacles have prevented your success?

KNOWLEDGE.label: Limited knowledge

STRESS.label: High stress
